attributes.comment:
We are adoptive parents, waiting to adopt a child from China. We have already
had to pay all the fees, but because the I 171 H is only good for 18 months and
the fingerprints for 15 months, we have to redo everything again before our
adoption is complete. Having to pay twice is already very difficult, with all of the
expenses we are facing with this adoption, but increasing the rates on top of
everything else is totally unfair. If you are going to increase the rates, then at
least make the adoption paperwork and fingerprints last long enough for us to
complete our adoption, without having to renew them. Thank you for considering
our situation, and that of thousands of other adoptive American families.

Sincerely, Heather and Thomas Wangeman
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Heather Wangeman
